Entries.Mon: How are you today, lad? I hope things are going well in town.^How are you today, lass? I hope things are going well in town.
Entries.Tue: What grand timing! I'd just brewed a pot of tea. Fancy a cuppa? [614]$3
Entries.Wed: And how's my old friend Willy! Next time you see him, tell him Old Henry says Hello!
Entries.Thu: Hello lad!^Hello lass#$b#I'm chuffed to bits that you're helping me with my project.$1
Entries.Fri: %The Curator is reading a newspaper.#$b#Ah, good day young chap.^Good day young lass.#$b#Just catching up on the latest news. Did you know there's been sightings of mermaids off the Cerulean coast?$3
Entries.Sat: In my younger days, I used to be quite the angler you know.$3#$b#Oh, I caught some whoppers!#$b#Told a few too, when it comes to that!$1
Entries.Sun: Don't forget to say 'Hello' to sweet Goldie. She loves attention.#$b#Did you know goldfish can live up to 43 years, and have very good memories?$1

Entries.Mon: ...$0#$b#*Goldie studies you intently, as though she's trying to remember your face.*$1
Entries.Wed: ...$2#$b#*Goldie swims around in circles. She looks restless.*$1
Entries.Thu: ...$0#$b#*Goldie swims up to the glass and blows you a kiss.*$4

Entries.6372001/t 1000 2100: 50s/20 49/Curator 16 46 3 farmer -100 -100 0 Goldie 15 46 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Curator "Here you go Goldie. Are you excited for your new home?$0"/pause 500/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Goldie "...$0#$b#...$1"/pause 500/emote Goldie 32/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/pause 500/jump Curator 3/emote Curator 28/pause 1500/textAboveHead Curator "Our first guest!"/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 16 52/faceDirection Curator 2/speak Curator "Greetings, and welcome to the Stardew Aquarium!$4"/pause 1500/move Curator 3 0 2/move Curator 0 3 2/move farmer 0 -1 0/speak Curator "You must be the farmer Willy told me about! 'Tis a pleasure to meet you!$0"/pause 500/speak Curator "Ah yes, your reputation preceeds you, lad!^Ah yes, your reputation preceeds you, lass!$0"/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Curator "I was wondering if perhaps you'd be willing to help me?$3"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 1 true/move Curator -2 0 2 true/speak Curator "As you may have noticed, we're a bit short on fish at present.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Curator 0/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Curator "Unless you count sweet Goldie back there, heh?$1"/pause 500/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Goldie "...$1#$b#...$2/pause 500/faceDirection Curator 2 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/speak Curator "I hear you're a competent angler.$0"/pause 500/emote Curator 28/speak Curator "Perhaps you'd consider donating a few of your catches for our display?$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Curator "You can deposit them here, at the counter. It'll only take me a moment to set it up.$0#$b#And do not fret; we have state of the art technology to ensure they live a long and healthy life.#$b#Like dear Goldie.$1"/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Goldie "...$2#$b#...$3"/pause 500/emote Goldie 20/pause 500/emote farmer 56/speak Curator "Excellent! Thank you!$4#$b#We shall keep a catalogue of all the fish that are on display.$0"/pause 1500/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/move farmer 0 1 2/textAboveHead Curator "One last thing!"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Curator "You may have noticed the submarine on the way in? That is our gift shop!$0#$b#We don't have a lot of stock currently, but as our exhibit grows, so too shall our wares!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

Abigail 3 true/pause 6000/stopAdvancedMoves/showFrame Leah 4/showFrame Sebastian 12/showFrame Sam 12/advancedMove Sandy false -1 0 0 5/pause 3000/stopAdvancedMoves/showFrame Sandy 0/speak Curator "*Ahem* Thank you...$0#$b#First and foremost I would like to thank everyone of ye' for coming to this special event.$1#$b#When I first opened the Stardew Aquarium, it was only dear Goldie and me.$0"/pause 500/speak Curator "But then I met @, his help has been invaluable for the success of the Aquarium!^But then I met @, her help has been invaluable for the success of the Aquarium!$1"/pause 500/jump Curator 5/pause 500/speak Curator "Now our aquarium collection is complete!$0#$b#And it is all thanks to you, @. All the specimens we can see around us today, are donated by @.$1"/pause 250/textAboveHead Willy "Good job!"/pause 250/emote Abigail 32/pause 100/emote Elliott 56/pause 100/textAboveHead Governor "Well done!"/pause 1500/speak Curator "@, all of this would not have been possible without you lad.^@, all of this would not have been possible without you lass.$0#$b#Therefor I am proud to present you with a special reward!$1"/pause 500/jump farmer 5/pause 500/speak Curator "The 'Stardew Aquarium Trophy', congratulations lad!^The 'Stardew Aquarium Trophy', congratulations lass!$4"/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 250/showFrame 57/pause 100/GiveAquariumTrophy1/null/GiveAquariumTrophy2/null/pause 2000/end

Entries.6372003/t 1000 2100/i {{spacechase0.Json: 50s/20 49/Curator 15 47 2 farmer -100 -100 0 Goldie 15 46 0/skippable/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 16 52/speak Curator "Ah hello @!$0"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 500/move Curator 1 0 2/speak Curator "So what have you come to donate today?$1"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 15/pause 200/playSound fishSlap/addObject 16 47 {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Razor Trout}} 1/pause 100/showFrame farmer 12/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 3/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 200/jump Curator 4/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/emote Curator 16/pause 500/move Curator -1 0 2 true/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Curator "Oh no lad, that won't do!$6^Oh no lass, that won't do!$6"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Curator "I know this fish, it's the Razor Trout.$2#$b#It's an invasive species to this area...$5"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Curator "It also eats other fish!$0"/pause 200/jump farmer 5/pause 200/speak Goldie "...$0#$b#*Goldie looks scared*$7"/pause 500/emote Goldie 16/pause 500/speak Curator "I don't think the Aquarium is a place for such a fish...$2#$b#You better take it with you.$0"/move farmer 1 0 0/pause 500/showFrame farmer 15/pause 200/removeSprite 16 47/playSound pickUpItem/pause 200/showFrame farmer 12/pause 500/speak Curator "Don't feel bad lad, I'm sure you didn't mean any harm.^Don't feel bad lass, I'm sure you didn't mean any harm.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/end

Entries.AquariumDonated:Legend: Wow that 'Legend' is really something aye?$0#$b#I saw it at the Aquarium the other day!$1
Entries.AquariumDonated:Crimsonfish: Have you seen the 'Crimsonfish' at the Aquarium?$0#$b#The Curator at the Aquarium told me it was caught at the pier next to my shop!$1
Entries.AquariumDonated:Angler: I saw the 'Angler' at the Aquarium, I'm told it was caught here in Pelican Town!$0
Entries.AquariumDonated:MutantCarp: That 'Mutant Carp' at the Aquarium is a real monster, have you seen it?$0
Entries.AquariumDonated:Glacierfish: Have you been to the Aquarium lately?$0#$b#I saw they have the 'Glacierfish' on display now, what a beauty!$1
Entries.AquariumDonated:Pufferchick: I snug down to the basement of the Aquarium, to take a peek at the 'Pufferchick'.$0#$b#It sure is a strange creature.$0
Entries.AquariumCompletedCT: Can you believe the Aquarium is all done?$0#$b#What a thing!$1

Entries.AquariumDonated:Pufferfish: Have you seen the 'Pufferfish' at the Aquarium?$0#$b#I love that thing!$1

Entries.AquariumDonated:Sandfish: I took Jas and Vincent on a trip to the Aquarium recently.$0#$b#It was a great education trip for the children. But I especially liked the 'Sandfish'. It was so cute!$1

Entries.AquariumDonated:Frog: Have you been to the Aquarium lately?$0#$b#I saw they have terrarium with a 'Frog', it looked lonely so I donated one of my pet frogs...$7#$b#So it could have a friend.$1

Entries.AquariumDonated:SuperCucumber: I saw that the Aquarium have a 'Super Cucumber' on display now.$0#$b#I believe it to be a peculiar type of the regular 'Sea Cucumber', it might possess arcane properties...$0#$b#%The Wizard seems lost in thought.

Entries.6372004_MantaYes: pause 500/jump Curator 7/pause 250/speak Curator "With your fishing rod?!$6#$b#Such a large beast, caught with a fishing rod...$2"/pause 500/speak Curator "Willy was right about you...$0#$b#You are an extraordinary angler!$4"/pause 100/jump farmer 5/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/faceDirection Curator 0 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Curator "It seems to be thriving well here.$0"/pause 250/faceDirection Curator 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 500/speak Curator "I should let you get back to it. Enjoy the rest of your visit to the Aquarium!$1"/pause 250/move Curator -6 0 3 true/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.6372005_LaHint: pause 500/stopAnimation Curator 0/pause 250/jump Curator 7/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Curator 1/pause 250/speak Curator "I know where this fish is from!$6"/pause 500/emote farmer 8 true/emote Wizard 8 true/pause 250/speak Curator "It's from a place called the 'Secret Woods'. At least that is what the person who donated it told me...$2"/pause 500/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0 true/faceDirection Curator 0 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "The Secret Woods?
